description: [``botocore``] Add support for Cross Region Inference in Bedrock Model Evaluations.
[``botocore``] This release includes support to add tags when creating a stream
[``botocore``] AWS End User Messaging SMS-Voice V2 has added support for resource policies. Use the three new APIs to create, view, edit, and delete resource policies.
[``botocore``] Adding `HiddenInstanceTypes` and `HiddenSageMakerImageVersionAliases` attribute to SageMaker API
